Title: A Simple Sacrifice (1)
Plot: Boyd and the team decide to reopen the 25 year old case of Annie Keel, a woman who was tried and convicted of a double homicide solely based upon her own confession. Boyd doubts the validity of the conviction, and decides to dig deeper to possibly discover what really happened. Why did Annie confess? Did she really commit murder, or was she covering for someone else?
GuestStars: Cal Macaninch,  Lynda Bellingham,  Anthony Valentine,  Nicholas Woodeson,  Robert Blythe,  Janet Dale,  Valerie Gogan,  Nicholas Hoult,  Elliott Henderson-Boyle,  Harriet Walter,  Rakie Ayola
